CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 27, 1957, pg. 3 reads: " Share Spotlight - Just to show that all of the fashion honors did not go to the younger set, Easter Sunday, The Courier photographer snapped this picture of Miss Ernestine Jones, left; her mother, Mrs. Fannie Jones, right, and a friend, Theodore Tabrien, as the trio left Wesley Center AME Zion Church."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ernestine Jones, Theodore Tabrien, and Fannie Jones, standing outside of Wesley Center AME Zion Church on Easter Sunday, vertical format
